FuncDef: This commands displays prefix level threshold stats of local DHCPv6 server prefix. A minimum-free threshold needs to be configured before system collects threshold stats for the prefix.
CLIs: prefix-threshold-stats pool <pool-name> detail [ format { exact | scientific } ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the pool in local DHCPv6 server, up to 32 characters.
Specifies that the number format in the display will be either exact or scientific.
Specifies the IPv6 prefix with prefix length.
